text: Tomalokara dhana-sampada arau santana-santati ene kono bastu nahaya yito tomalokaka maryadara disata amara ocarata nikatararti karai diba; kintu yisakale imana aniche arau satkarma karaiche, te'omloke'i nija karmara babe paba bahuguna pratidana; arau te'omloka su'ucca attalikata niraapade thakiba
